effect.black_white: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.black_2_white_2: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

short_effect.black_white: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.
